metadata.title: CVE-2019-17544 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
libaspell.a in GNU Aspell before 0.60.8 has a stack-based buffer over-readin acommon::unescape in common/getdata.cpp via an isolated \ character.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17544` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aspell - 0.60.7~20110707-4ubuntu0.1
libaspell15 - 0.60.7~20110707-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aspell package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.60.7~20110707-4ubuntu0.1').
